snippet: A question of whether his sudden gains in the polls will hold.
abstract: A question of whether his sudden gains in the polls will hold.
lead_paragraph: SIOUX CITY, Iowa - Emboldened by a late and unexpected rise in the polls, Rick Santorum came to this conservative corner of rural Iowa on Sunday and urged his supporters to redouble their efforts to help ensure a win in the state's caucuses on Tuesday night.

headline.main: Santorum Pushes Supporters to Keep His Surge Alive
